unnormalised: Defence News Flash: Big changes afoot in the armed forces!
normalised: Defence News Flash: Big changes afoot in the armed forces!

unnormalised: Sources say Lt. Gen. Rajesh Kumar is tipped to become the next Chief of Army Staff. Apparently, the current COAS, Gen. Menon, retires on 31/12/2024. Lt. Gen. Kumar, currently serving in the Northern Command, has a distinguished career spanning 30+ years. A lot of buzz around this decision.
normalised: Sources say Lieutenant General Rajesh Kumar is tipped to become the next Chief of Army Staff. Apparently, the current C-O-A-S, General Menon, retires on thirty first december two thousand and twenty four. Lieutenant General Kumar, currently serving in the Northern Command, has a distinguished career spanning thirty plus years. A lot of buzz around this decision.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, in other news, reports confirm that Air Marshal Sharma will be heading the Western Air Command. His predecessor, Air Marshal Verma, is reportedly moving to a different assignment. We hear that Air Marshal Sharma is a highly decorated officer with extensive experience in fighter operations.
normalised: Meanwhile, in other news, reports confirm that Air Marshal Sharma will be heading the Western Air Command. His predecessor, Air Marshal Verma, is reportedly moving to a different assignment. We hear that Air Marshal Sharma is a highly decorated officer with extensive experience in fighter operations.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that the Navy might soon see a new Vice Admiral taking charge. Adm. Joshi’s term ends in Q1 2025, and sources suggest that Rear Adm. Bhatia is a frontrunner for the position. Seems like a lot of reshuffling at the top levels. The official announcements are expected sometime next month.
normalised: Word on the street is that the Navy might soon see a new Vice Admiral taking charge. Admiral Joshi’s term ends in Q one two thousand and twenty five, and sources suggest that Rear Admiral Bhatia is a frontrunner for the position. Seems like a lot of reshuffling at the top levels. The official announcements are expected sometime next month.

unnormalised: And finally, Major Khan from the Parachute Regiment was awarded the Sena Medal for his bravery in a recent counter-insurgency operation. He was instrumental in neutralising 3 terrorists in the Kupwara district on 15/11/2024. A real hero, folks! Kudos to him.
normalised: And finally, Major Khan from the Parachute Regiment was awarded the Sena Medal for his bravery in a recent counter-insurgency operation. He was instrumental in neutralising three terrorists in the Kupwara district on fifteenth november two thousand and twenty four. A real hero, folks! Kudos to him.

unnormalised: This is all for now. Stay tuned for more updates! We will bring you more news as soon as possible.
normalised: This is all for now. Stay tuned for more updates! We will bring you more news as soon as possible.
